description:
Hitamuki`s skills impressed Kikuru. Then he realized her lack of self-preservation gets her into trouble in more ways than one. It`s going to be a long training session...
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Hitamuki ni Ganbarimasu! / Shoujo no Shiranai Sekai
I`ll Do My Best! / Her First Step into a New World
Я выложусь по полной! / Мир, о котором она даже не подозревала
ひたむきに頑張ります! / 少女の知らない世界
